title: 4J Studios：Minecraft PS3版已经售出了一百万份
author: cyqsimon
txt_content:
本帖最后由 a20001017 于 2014-1-25 11:44 编辑 

4J Studios：#MinecraftPS3 has sold over 1 MILLION copies!mojang.com/2014/01/minecr...
4J Studios：#Minecraft PS3版已经售出了一百万份！mojang.com/2014/01/minecr...


Mojang.com链接里的信息：

Hello all!
大家好！

Hope you are enjoying the picking and placing of blocks!
希望你们喜欢上了摧毁和放置方块！
Just wanted to let you know that Minecraft on PS3 recently sold over 1 million copies (that has to be some kind of record on PSN, no?).
我只是想让你们知道，PS3版的Minecraft最近刚刚卖出了第一百万份（这应该可以在PSN平台的销量记录上榜上有名了）。
It is crazy considering the game was released just before Christmas last year.
考虑到PS3版的Minecraft去年的圣诞节前才发布，这真的是很疯狂的一件事。
We are super grateful for the support and we are very thankful for your dedication and I hope you will like the future updates we have planned for you (more on that in a later blog post).
我们非常感谢你们对我们的支持以及对Minecraft的执着，希望你们会喜欢我们以后计划带来的更新（以后会另发一篇文章详细介绍）。

Enjoy your weekend! xoxo
周末快乐！【飞吻拥抱
